Artist Profile

Jake Woods

Born 1986, Perth, Western Australia.

Artist Profile

Jake
Woods

Born 1986, Perth, Western Australia

Valerie Dicker’s artwork combines cultural symbols with different colours and vast of materials. The Italian-American and New York based artist specialises in photography, digital art and painting.
